name: Chalet Murasaki
description: This 8 bedroom chalet (487 sqm) features a large master bedroom (55 sqm) with a hinoki en-suite bathroom and a daybed nook for quiet relaxation.

name: Chalet Murasaki a
description: This 6 bedroom chalet features a large master bedroom (55 sqm) with a hinoki-lined en suite, large walk-in closet and daybed nook for quiet relaxation.

name: Chalet Murasaki b
description: The 2 bedroom Chalet Murasaki Apartment (75.5 sqm) is fully equipped with all amenities, including 2 large flat-screen cable TVs, high-speed WiFi broadband internet, private ski storage, full kitchen and dining facilities, private laundry room and free parking space.

name: Deep Tracks 1
description: Located just 200 m from the Hirafu Gondola, this 1 bedroom apartment is ideal for those seeking fresh tracks.

name: Deep Tracks 2
description: Located just 200 m from the Hirafu Gondola, this 1 bedroom apartment is ideal for those seeking fresh tracks.
